text: Many thanks for this beer to kevnic2008. Piwo jak to na bawarskiego pszeniczniaka przystalo ma spora i trwala piane. burzliwie powstajaca nawet podczas wolnego nalewania po szkle. Aromat czysto bananowy. Oczywiscie barwa zlota i klarowana, smak same banany i lekka slodowosc. bez goryczki piwo

Tap (Hofbrau, Berlin) (6:4:6-:4-:12-=3.2---)
Pleasant sweetish banana aroma. Fullish palate, light but just a little sticky. Decentish wheaty banana taste, but I so prefer a hefe to a kristall. Decentish and clean.

Tap (Hofbräu Berlin, Berlin). Clear yellow color. Medium size, thick white head, stays. Banana, sweet, sourish, grainy in aroma. Banana, grainy and bit of chalk in taste. Fizzy carbonation. Sweet mouthfeel. Feels dead and bland to me.
Klares goldgelb mit reichlich Schaum. Malzig, fruchtig, reife Bananen, leicht süßlich, sehr spritzig.
bottle from Heinrichs 3000 Kornwestheim. Clear golden with a tall white head. Fruity nose. Wheaty with hints of banana and a slightly cardboardy finish.
Chios bar Budapest hazy gold banana citrus wheat taste same decent body. Decent stuff.
Draft at Hofbrau Berlin.Pour it with small white head with clear yellow gold color, a little bit basque.Taste of citrus, banana.Flavour very interesting.
500ml Flasche. Ins Glas ergießt sich ein klares goldgelbes Bier, viel CO2, viel Schaum. Geruch hefig, leicht malzig fruchtig. Geschmack hefig, fruchtig, im Abgang leicht würzig.
Poured from a tap. Cloudy yellow color, full white frothy head. Strong wheat smell with undertones of banana. Sweet clove and banana flavor.

Draught @ Hofbräu München, Berlin
Pours clear golden with a white head. Aroma has notes of malt, wheat and banana. Taste is light sweet and light bitter with a banana finish. Body is light, texture is thin to oily, carbonation is soft.

Bottle at Hofbräu Hamburg.
Clear yellow coloured with a small white head.
Fruity aroma of hay, caramel and bananas.
Sweet and fruity flavour of caramel, bananas and spices.
Sweet finish.
Tap @ Hofbräu and det Alster. Nice head with good duration. Color is golden. Aroma and taste are wheat malt, yeasty notes, fruits, banana and hops.

On tap at Hofbräu Berlin.
Soft wheat malt feel, lively carbonation under a perfect head. Banana and citrus. Not exciting, but it is hard to dislike this!

#102
Säuerliches Apfelaroma neben der Hefe. Im Antrunk fruchtig (Zitrone&Apfel) und sehr liquide. Geschmacklich trocken ausgelegt, nur minimal prickelnd. Ganz nett.
Tap @ Hofbräu and der Alster. Clear godlen with a big and alsting white head. Aroma is sweet, wheaty, banana and yeasty. Flavor is medium sweet. Sweet finish. Soft. Good kristall. 011212
Crystal clear. Nose is lemony wheat. Flavor is wheat, some very light malt, slight banana.
Bottle. Average mass produced German Weizen. Dark yellow colour, medium white head. Light aroma, Light bodied medium taste. Very refreshing. Good buy for its price.
light sweet citrus aroma,golden, clear, white foam, light sweetness, lightly bitter, medium body, soft carbonation, nice soft sweet weiss finish.

Sampled at Hofbrau, Hamburg. Looks good, golden coloured and clear .Has a white head, fully lasting. Aroma is herbal, yeasty and nice. Flavor starts sweet and finish light bitter. Creamy and lively carbonation.
Draught Hofbrau Berlin. Lught golden colour with a medium head. Aroma is very light metallic. Flavour is bubblegum and candy, finish is refreshing

On tap at Hofbräu an der Alster, Hamburg, October 2, 2011.

Clear golden with a large white head. Malty aroma with spices and some light notes of banana. The same in the descent taste.

Im Geruch zitronig-grasig und herb-hefig besetzt. Dabei ein wenig streng wirkend. 
Antrunk süßlich-zitronig. Mittig eine herbe Hefigkeit mit mehligen Tönen. Abgang apfelig, leicht säuerlich und trocken. 
Sehr solide.Test vom 21.4.2011
On tap shared begrudgingly with the wife. Slight bananas, malts. Not really interesting, but better than the original.
Nice heavy carbonization. Golden colour, small white head. Quite good beer.
08.05.2004, 0,5l Bottle. Pale yellow and clear.White head. Aroma is a little weak and I think that this have been better if it wasnt filtered. Nice flower-like hoppy flavour.

Im not a huge fan of this overly carbonated weizen...especially the german hefeweizen.  It doesnt quite mix as well with the fuller body, thick, viscous, and full of banana and clove flavors that are enjoyable.  It overpowers those aspects, and brings it to an abrupt finish on the palate.  I do like the balance however, as it is well done.  Drinkable, but not my speed.
(Stockholm Beer Festival 2007) Draught. Pale golden, big white head. Malty, spicy, somewhat fruity aroma with notes of banana. Malty banana flavor, bubble gum and candy notes. Somewhat spicy finish.

Thanks to ghawener.  Refreshing.  One of my favorite types of beer.  This one pours a very light yellow color with a medium head.  Fruity, but not to sweet, not a lot of depth on this one, but definitely enjoyable.

Bottled. Golden colour, small white head. Banana and some hay in aroma. Flavour is banana and wheat. Quite nice for a Kristall Weisse, but the flavour is cut quite abruptly after the finish. A bit overcarbonated in my opinion, otherwise nice.

Bottled (BB 11/2006)
Clear golden color, big cloudy white head. Dry, a bit smokey banana aroma. Medium-bodied, crisp, roasted banana flavor. Quite tasty as Kristallweizen.
Bottled. Clear golden in colour. With fluffy white head. The aroma is that of wheat and its fruity. The flavour is fruity and sweet, the wheat is present and has a great finish.
Pale golden colour with moderate sized white head. Big bubblegum aroma, also some nice yeast. Taste is bubblegum, cloves and bananas. Nice smooth mouthfeel. Very good Kristall Weisse.

UPDATED: MAY 20, 2004 bottled:
this one is like a light wheat or almost a white beer. nice for a hot day when cutting the lawn. bubbly dry.
500ml bottle: Pours light yellow with a thick fluffy white head. Mild wheat flavor and a nice wheat finish. Yeasty, malty aroma with a touch of spice.

UPDATED: AUG 25, 2004 Sweet, yeasty, hoppy and fruity aroma. Clear golden coloured. Looks really like a pilsener however with a better head. Taste is sweet hoppy, much fruits and a pleasant very smooth palate. Bonuspoints for the finish.

(500 ml. bottle). Filtered wheat beer, like the name says crystal clear, very light golden, enormous head. Strong aroma of ripe bananas (or rather: the artificial "banana" filling you get in some chocolates + bubble gum), cloves too.  Banana, cloves and hops in the flavour - but there's just too little of everything. Why filter away the goodies? Very short aftertaste.
